Pricing

$580* – 1 bedroom unfurnished

$630* – 1 bedroom furnished


*Prices include all utilities and internet. Phone service is not included.


Only 1 unfurnished opening is available for Winter 2011. Additional openings are available for the Spring 2011 semester. Use the application form to signup.

Floorplans

Community Features

  • Friendly community tailored to newly married couples
  • Newly constructed buildings
  • Across the street from BYU-Idaho
  • Clubhouse game room with big-screen TV and couches
  • Beautiful view of BYU-Idaho
  • Large parking lot
  • Laundry facilities
  • Storage Rooms to secure additional personal belongings

Apartment Features

  • New carpet, tile, appliances, cabinets and fixtures
  • Living room, kitchen, bedroom, bathroom
  • Stove, fridge, dishwasher, microwave
  • Large bedroom closet, utility closet
  • Wired for DSL, cable TV & phone

Furnished Apartments Include

  • Love seat
  • Dining table and four chairs
  • Coffee table
  • Two end tables
  • TV stand / TV
  • Desk
  • Queen size bed
